content.description: Beginning a few feet left of The Good Egg, scramble up and left to reach the start of Under The Guillotine. Climb the face under a large block, passing it on the right. Continue up the face to the two bolt and chains anchor.
content.protection: Seven bolts and a two bolt chain anchor.
content.location: Under The Guillotine is between Frizzlefry and The Good Egg.

content.description: The Good Egg starts below the large block at the top center of the face. Climb past two bolts to a crack, which is used to reach the face above. Two more bolts on this face lead to the large block which gives the route its name. The final two bolts protect enjoyable climbing up the left side of this block to the bolts and chains anchor.
content.protection: Six bolts and cams, chain anchors
content.location: Center, south face of The Cove.

content.description: On the far left side of The Cove easy face climbing leads to a left leaning seam. Climb this seam past two bolts exiting onto the face above. Continue up the face past two more bolts to the bolts and chains anchor.
content.protection: Four Bolts and small cams, chain anchors
content.location: Far left side of The Cove.

content.description: To the right of The Good Egg, enjoyable face climbing leads past seven bolts to the bolts with chains anchor.
content.protection: Seven Bolts and two bolt with chains anchor.
content.location: South face of The Cove to the right of The Good Egg.
